articles.content:

articles.title: Best Bars in Asia: Coa, Hong Kong; Jigger & Pony, Singapore; SG Club, Tokyo - Bloomberg
articles.description: Singapore and Tokyo hotspots also fared well in a list of the region’s top 50 drinking spots.
articles.content:
The best bar in Asia is 
Coa in Hong Kong. with Singapore’s 
Jigger & Pony the number two, according to Asia’s 50 Best Bars.
